translations.2411717922174348092: Analytical cookies help us to improve Archipel products by collecting and reporting information on their usage.

translations.8625084254754241757: You can set your consent preferences and determine how you want your data to be used based on the purposes below. You may set your preferences for us independently from those of third-party partners. Each purpose has a description so that you know how your data are used.
translations.761519996236687914: These are essential to the operation of the platform's services.
translations.6994531571497410122: The storage of information, such as images, content or credentials for better performances and automatic log in.
translations.4615252031474295138: Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics are used to monitor users’ behavior on our services, which include giving accurate statistics to sales agents based on that cookie.
translations.1263055339247085835: These are optional but very useful for us to provide you with optimal services.
translations.776147319408245467: Intercom is used as a communication service to enable users to discuss directly with the Cascade8 team.

translations.3833375040274287980: Welcome to the section dedicated to crafting the revenue distribution (waterfall) for your film or series (Title). Please adhere to the following structured guidelines to ensure an accurate and efficient setup:
translations.2303120831950293258: This schema illustrates the revenue flow, systematically channeling funds from the top tier downwards.
translations.5189168717017194519: These are the origins of your revenue. Typically, they encompass various media and geographical territories.
translations.5657291862608249188: Receipt Shares represent the entitlements granted to each stakeholder, allowing them to claim a portion of the earnings. This may include commission fees, recoupment of expenses, the producer’s net revenue share, or other rights afforded to stakeholders.
translations.1559939537591550170: Individual Stakeholder Focus: Tackle the waterfall creation one stakeholder at a time. It’s advisable to start with the sales agent and main distributor’s mandates.
translations.5132116771125525004: Establish Receipt Sources: For each stakeholder, identify and list all the Receipt Sources from which they derive revenue.
translations.2887534416490094489: Structure Receipt Shares: Begin by allocating Receipt Shares that draw from the initial earnings ('first euros'). Subsequently, establish subsequent shares in a sequential manner.
